reviews.review:
Napisz recenzję dla Portal 2
Opisz, co podobało ci się (lub nie) w tej grze i czy polecasz ją innym użytkownikom.
Pamiętaj o zachowaniu uprzejmości i stosowaniu się do zasad i wytycznych.
La co-op et la solo sont tout les deux incroyables !

não sei como esse jogo não foi GOTY quando lançou
sei que competir com Skyrim é meio complicado, mas sem dúvidas esse jogo é um dos maiores da geração retrasada
fez parte da minha infância com toda justiça, jogo se mantém sólido do início ao fim

meu xodózin <3
比起解密，我感觉更考眼力

好玩！
就是不出3
shit

Игра интересная. Сюжет тоже, но есть недочётики в переводе на русский но они минимальные что оочень классно. Да стоит она хоть и многовато но всёжн интересная советую вам поиграть. Если вам оочень нравится решать головоломки то она для вас.
Dont play this game if you are fatty and have no parents
Головоломка классная, но грустная почему-то хз
Incredible story, graphics, gameplay, and super brain-flexing fun!
Buena historia y narrativa, es valve, siempre hay calidad
this game was life changing to me. it had cured my cancer and solved all of my mental issues. it is thanks to this game that i am breathing today
Крутая игра! Играю каждый день, сражаюсь с криперами, террорами, и хаги ваги! Советаю этот роблокс.
Очень классная игра, советую проходить её с другом.
Good ol' fashioned fun.  Legitimately just FUN.
Coming from an average gamer i have to say this game is one of the best games i have ever played

解谜游戏扛把子，极富想象力的道具设计关卡设计，正反馈强烈
但个人不太喜欢六七章，有些考验眼力，地图太大找得头晕
не считая, что это великая игра, она также использует прием half life 2, возвращающий в начало под конец игры.
fun cheap, original mechanics, great story telling , and really good voice acting

I was truly blown away with how great this game was. I went in with really no expectations, all I knew is that it was a popular game a lot of people liked, so I decided to try it out for myself. Such a good piece of storytelling, world building, characters, and of course, the gameplay and puzzles that made me feel dumb
挺有意思的，跟孩子一起玩的。
This game is great, very fun and still holds up 10 years later!

Solving the puzzles with the portal gun is amazing. Story gives the very unique vibe which doesn't distract you when brainstorming. Gameplay is smooth and fun with a [b]great learning curve[/b] that is not making you read or watch a tutorial to make things go right way. The story will take you something around from [b]5.5 to 9 hours[/b] depending on how fast you will be passing through the puzzles.
Game features [b]separate cooperative story for 2 players[/b] that lasts about [b]10 hours[/b]. There's also [b]the level editor[/b] that supports [b]Steam Workshop[/b] so you can create and download custom-made puzzle chambers.
El primero me pareció un juego extraordinario, con esta segunda entrega mejoraron todo lo que ya era bueno y me creó la necesidad de jugar Alyx. Que juegazo no tiene desperdicio.
I would say to play it it's a great game with lots of detail
This is one of the greatest games I've ever played! Much fun!
С удовольствием поиграл в первую и во вторую часть.

actually my favorite game ever

update, sorry it's OMORI now, but this is easily my second favorite game

(please don't hunt me down valve)
PORTAL 2. Envelheceu bem até mesmo em 2022

L'un de mes plus grands coup de coeur ! L'histoire de ce jeu est vraiment bien écrit et ne me lasse jamais ! Pour y avoir joué depuis de nombreuses années, je trouve les graphismes toujours aussi beau !!
Merci Valve
Finally getting around to playing this. I know it's a staple to the PC community, and damn I see why. This game is so fun.

Барон П'єр де Куберген у 1924 році на Олімпійських іграх у Парижі виголосив девіз[b] Citius, altius, fortius - commnis[/b], що дослівно означає  "Швидше, вище, сильніше-разом" та з точністю характеризує Portal 2.
Шедевр [b] 10/10 [/b].
P.S. GLAdOS неймовірна.
Если любишь ты портал то прыгай в эту игру тут ты хотябы пороботаешь головой (если что это не оскорбление это прикол) :)
Good game, first game is still better. But still a good game
very good game, very good ending and good storyline

Úžasná hra, 
Doporučuji všem 
GamePlay tak na 8 hodin
Je tam MultiPlayer a možnost vytvořit vlastí hratelnou mapu
Příběh 10/10
haha portals goo brrr (but this time there's more lore)
It wasn't very challenging for me personally, but it was very fun to play.
He killed me at the part where he kills me
Very good game, 10/10, everyone needs to play it at least once
